content.query:
-----------------------------
---- ROUND ROBIN TABLE
--------------------------------
CREATE TABLE round_table
(
    id INT,
    name VARCHAR(4000),
    salary INT
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN
)

INSERT INTO round_table VALUES
(1,'jivu',1111)

SELECT * FROM round_table

-----------------------------
---- REPLICATE TABLE
--------------------------------
CREATE SCHEMA gold;

CREATE TABLE gold.dim_product
(
  dim_key_prod INT,
  prod_id INT,
  Prod_name VARCHAR(4000)
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE
)

-----------------------------
---- HASH TABLE
--------------------------------

CREATE TABLE gold.facttable
(
  dim_key_prod INT,
  revenue INT,
  cost INT 
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH(dim_key_prod)
)
